data.eml:eml: Genus Microlithosia (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae) in Laos, with the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bayarsaikhan, Ulziijargal, Lee, Dong-June, Bae, Yang-Seop (2018): Genus Microlithosia (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae) in Laos, with the description of a new species. Zootaxa 4420 (4): 502-508, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4420.4.3
